title: No LRT Service for Sengkang and Punggol due to System Fault

updates.text: Train service on the Sengkang LRT has resumed. Free bridging and regular bus services have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Service on Punggol LRT has resumed but Sengkang LRT is still down. Free regular and bridging bus services are available at designated bus stops near affected stations.
No service on Sengkang and Punggol LRT. Free bridging and regular bus svcs are available at designated bus stops for affected stations.
At 0608hrs, no LRT Svc for Sengkang and Punggol LRT due to System Fault. Free Regular Bus Svc is available for both Sengkang and Punggol LRT.
